ru.ncedu.java.tasks

Interface BusinessCard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BusinessCardImpl

    public interface BusinessCard
    ЦЕЛИ ЗАДАЧИ:
    - Научиться разбирать (parse) потоки InputStreams с помощью java.util.Scanner.
    - Разобраться с java.util.Calendar.
    - Привыкать читать требования по-английски :).

    ЗАДАНИЕ
    Создать экземпляр своего класса визитной карточки (класса, реализующего данный интерфейс) в методе getBusinessCard(Scanner).
    Большинство методов должны просто возвращать считанные через Scanner значения.
    Расчет возраста по дате рождения может проводиться в методе getAge() - необязательно это делать сразу в getBusinessCard(Scanner)).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAge() 
      BusinessCard getBusinessCard(java.util.Scanner scanner)
      This method obtains (via Scanner) information from an input stream that contains the following information about an Employee:
      Name - String
      Last name - String
      Department - String
      Birth date - String in format: "DD-MM-YYYY", where DD - two-digits birth date, MM - two-digits month of birth, YYYY - year of birth
      Gender : F or M - Character
      Salary : number from 100 to 100000
      Phone number : 10-digits number
      All entries are separated with ";" sign
      The format of input is the following:
      Name;Last name;Department;Birth date;Gender;Salary;Phone number
      java.lang.String getDepartment() 
      java.lang.String getEmployee() 
      java.lang.String getGender() 
      java.lang.String getPhoneNumber() 
      int getSalary() 

    • Method Detail

      • getBusinessCard

        BusinessCard getBusinessCard(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        This method obtains (via Scanner) information from an input stream that contains the following information about an Employee:
        Name - String
        Last name - String
        Department - String
        Birth date - String in format: "DD-MM-YYYY", where DD - two-digits birth date, MM - two-digits month of birth, YYYY - year of birth
        Gender : F or M - Character
        Salary : number from 100 to 100000
        Phone number : 10-digits number
        All entries are separated with ";" sign
        The format of input is the following:
        Name;Last name;Department;Birth date;Gender;Salary;Phone number
        Parameters:
        scanner - Data source
        Returns:
        Business Card
        Throws:
        InputMismatchException - Thrown if input value does not correspond to the data format given above (for example, if phone number is like "AAA", or date format is incorrect, or salary is too high)
        NoSuchElementException - Thrown if input stream hasn't enough values to construct a BusinessCard

      • getEmployee

        java.lang.String getEmployee()
        Returns:
        Employee Name and Last name separated by space (" "), like "Chuck Norris"

      • getDepartment

        java.lang.String getDepartment()
        Returns:
        Employee Department name, like "DSI"

      • getSalary

        int getSalary()
        Returns:
        Employee Salary, like 1000

      • getAge

        int getAge()
        Returns:
        Employee Age in years, like 69

      • getGender

        java.lang.String getGender()
        Returns:
        Employee Gender: either "Female" or "Male"

      • getPhoneNumber

        java.lang.String getPhoneNumber()
        Returns:
        Employee Phone Number in the following format: "+7 123-456-78-90"
